name: Candy Blizzard
description: This is a cute casual game of candy elimination. Players can recharge the stars by eliminating the candies from the area through the classic match-3 gameplay. After the stars are full of energy, players can receive various rewards, some of which are rewards for unlocking encounters with beautiful girls, and some are for unlocking the corresponding memory. Fragments, the reward will be random, what kind of beautiful girl will you get? It's all up to your own luck~
